survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of employees with the digital onboarding process implemented by the organization.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding experience?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the digital onboarding process did you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key strengths of the onboarding process. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
